4-pin header,, JP1,, (38400 8N1),, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys$ |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RT3125W |manuf_rev = -D40 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = less common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/10/2005 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 745883568574 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000C77XSS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Airgo AGN3023MX-01 |rad1modif = Mini PCI (long) |rad1chip1 = Airgo;AGN303BB; |rad1chip2 = Airgo;AGN311RF; |rad1chip3 = Airgo;AGN312RF; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 240 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RT3125W-D40", "REV:1.1", "28-000371", and "3028-002061" is silkscreened on the router main board. "704-00104-08" is silkscreened on the wireless module. {{see also|Askey}} WRT54GX4 serial numbers appear to start with '''KLD0'''. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial header is the (populated) '''JP1'''. 
JP1 [ (RxD) (TxD) (GND) (...) ]
  v
to RTL8651B
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
